room_title: Escape room "The Museum Robbery" by Escape on Palafox in Pensacola
review: We had such and awesome time! Escaped Museum Robbery with a few mins to spare!

room_title: Escape room "The Museum Robbery" by Escape on Palafox in Pensacola
review: Great rooms and great staff. We did the Museum Art Gallery and it was awesome. Very challenging and extremely creative puzzles and clues. I Highly recommend them.

room_title: Escape room "The Museum Robbery" by Escape on Palafox in Pensacola
review: Took my mom for Mother's Day. When the rest of the group showed up we split into guys vs. girls. We were working on the last clue in the museum when time ran out. Had so much fun!

room_title: Escape room "The Museum Robbery" by Escape on Palafox in Pensacola
review: We escaped the Museum Room - the laser on the last room was a little weak so it took some time to crack that last code.. apart from that - our group had a great time and we definitely want to come back again and do the other rooms!!
